titleStmt.title: To the right honourable, the House of Peeres, now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of James archbishop of Armagh
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Dated on verso: Die Veneris, 11. Februarii, 1641.
Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library.
